name: Restroom
description: In the Philippines, Children are being used as a soldier by the other armed opposition organization. They were trained to hate the government armed forces and kill as many of them as possible. I happened to meet one of them back then. A 15 year old teen ager who only knows how to use a gun but never learned how to read. I just happened to see him while looking for a place to pee. The cottage at the background happened to be the restroom of the camp site.
